I'm Keenon, an NLP geek at Stanford.


Scroll to fly
I try to remember humans
are already AI complete.

We need to get back to superhuman partnership
with AI, not replacement of humans by AI systems.

I study AI + People.

These are some of my proudest projects:
MinimalML:
Accelerating real ML research.

CUDA-LReg:
Regression at ludicrous speed.

Real-Valued Multi-armed Bandit:
Way beyond A/B testing.

I collect ideas like some people
collect butterflies.
Under Construction:
My blog posts are still
getting used to their new wings.
